Religious visits
Discover Your Ultimate Kashmir Tour Package from Kolkata
By Kashmir Online
Sep 17, 2024
4 min read

Are you dreaming of an escape to the picturesque valleys and snow-capped mountains of Kashmir? The good news is, now you can explore the heaven on Earth with a comprehensive Kashmir tour package from Kolkata. With mesmerizing landscapes, pristine lakes, and captivating gardens, Kashmir has been a top destination for tourists all around the world. Whether you’re planning a romantic getaway or a family vacation, Kashmir has something for everyone. This guide will walk you through everything you need to know about your journey from the City of Joy to the paradise of Kashmir.

Why Choose a Kashmir Tour Package from Kolkata?

Planning a vacation can often seem overwhelming with endless choices, but selecting a Kashmir tour package from Kolkata simplifies the process. It offers a hassle-free experience by taking care of your accommodations, travel, and sightseeing. With this package, you’ll not only save time but also ensure that you don’t miss any of the key attractions in Kashmir. If you’re considering a vacation but don’t know where to start, this package is ideal for you.

Kashmir is a destination that promises to captivate your senses. From houseboats on Dal Lake to the tulip gardens of Srinagar, the beauty of this region is surreal. The serene environment and scenic views make it the perfect retreat for anyone looking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life. For people in Kolkata, a well-curated tour package from Kolkata to Kashmir can make this dream a reality.

Must-Visit Destinations in Your Kashmir Tour Package

Your Kashmir tour package from Kolkata will include some of the most beautiful spots in the region. Let’s dive into the top destinations that should be on your travel itinerary:

Srinagar

The heart and soul of Kashmir, Srinagar is famous for its pristine Dal Lake, Shankaracharya Temple, and Mughal gardens. Therefore the stay in a traditional houseboat on Dal Lake is a must for anyone visiting Kashmir. The floating gardens, the Shikara rides, and the breathtaking view of the snow-capped mountains make Srinagar a top destination for tourists.

Gulmarg

A haven for adventure lovers, Gulmarg is known for skiing, snowboarding, and trekking. During the winter months, this hill station turns into a white wonderland, offering one of the best skiing experiences in India. The Gulmarg Gondola is a must-try for spectacular views of the mountains and valleys.

Pahalgam

Known for its lush meadows, gushing rivers, and panoramic views, Pahalgam is another gem in your Kashmir tour package from Kolkata. It is perfect for nature lovers and photographers. Whether you’re strolling through Betaab Valley or taking a horse ride to Baisaran, Pahalgam’s beauty is unmatched.

Sonamarg

If you’re looking for untouched beauty, Sonamarg is the place to be. Translating to “Meadow of Gold,” Sonamarg is known for its awe-inspiring glaciers, snow-capped peaks, and serene environment. Therefore the trek to the Thajiwas Glacier should be on your list if you love adventure.

Yusmarg

A lesser-known destination but equally beautiful, Yusmarg is a peaceful and secluded meadow. Perfect for a picnic or a quiet afternoon walk, Yusmarg is still untouched by the hustle of tourism, offering a serene escape for those seeking solitude.

Modes of Travel: Kolkata to Kashmir

When planning your trip, the question arises: how do you get from Kolkata to Kashmir? There are a couple of options available, each offering a unique experience.

1. By Air

The fastest and most convenient way to reach Kashmir from Kolkata is by air. You can book a flight from Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose International Airport in Kolkata to Sheikh ul-Alam International Airport in Srinagar. The journey takes approximately 2.5 to 3 hours. Upon arrival in Srinagar, you can start your exploration immediately.

2. By Train

For those who enjoy scenic train rides, a Kashmir tour package from Kolkata by train is a fantastic option. Although there is no direct train to Srinagar, you can travel from Kolkata to Jammu Tawi. The train journey offers a chance to see the changing landscapes of India. From Jammu, you can either take a short flight to Srinagar or travel by road through the picturesque mountains.

Best Time to Book a Kashmir Tour Package from Kolkata

The ideal time to visit Kashmir depends on the type of experience you’re seeking. If you’re looking to enjoy the snow and indulge in winter sports, December to February is perfect. For those who want to witness the blooming gardens and vibrant colors, plan your trip between March and May. Autumn, from September to November, is also a lovely time to visit, offering cool weather and golden hues.

Things to Consider Before Booking Your Tour

When booking a tour package from Kolkata to Kashmir, there are a few things you should keep in mind to make the most of your trip.

  1. Inclusions in the Package
    Check what your package includes. Does it cover accommodations, meals, and transport? Are sightseeing tours and entry fees included? Some packages also offer guides who will take you through the history and significance of various sites.
  2. Weather Conditions
    Kashmir experiences different weather conditions throughout the year. If you’re visiting during winter, be prepared for cold temperatures and possible snowfall. Pack warm clothing and accessories to stay comfortable during your trip.
  3. Travel Insurance
    Consider opting for travel insurance, especially if you’re traveling during the winter months. This will give you peace of mind and cover any unforeseen circumstances.
  4. Local Cuisine
    Don’t miss the opportunity to indulge in Kashmiri cuisine. From Rogan Josh to Yakhni, the food is flavorful and rich in tradition. Many packages offer meals that include authentic Kashmiri dishes, allowing you to savor the local delicacies.
  5. Cultural Sensitivity
    Kashmir is a culturally rich region with its own customs and traditions. Be respectful of local norms, dress modestly, and always ask for permission before photographing locals, especially in religious or sensitive areas.

What Makes a Kashmir Tour Special?

A Kashmir tour package from Kolkata promises an experience that is truly unforgettable. The warmth and hospitality of the people, combined with the awe-inspiring landscapes, create an enchanting atmosphere. Whether you’re walking through the vibrant tulip fields in spring or enjoying a snowfall in Gulmarg, every moment in Kashmir feels magical.

The lush greenery of the valleys, the crystal-clear lakes, and the snow-capped peaks create the perfect setting for relaxation and adventure. The region’s culture, cuisine, and history also add layers to your journey, making it more enriching and memorable.

A Kashmir tour package from Kolkata offers everything you could hope for in a vacation — adventure, tranquility, and the chance to reconnect with nature. Whether you’re planning to travel by air or opting for a Kashmir tour package from Kolkata by train, this trip promises to be an adventure of a lifetime.

So why wait? Start planning your journey to Kashmir today with Kashmir Online and experience the serenity, beauty, and magic that this enchanting region has to offer. Explore the captivating sights, enjoy the local culture, and create memories that will last a lifetime.
